name: Italian Christmas Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 Large (46 oz. ) Cans college in chicken broth
1 (16 oz) package Stokleys (or other) Japanese vegetables (Gr. Beans, Broccoli, red peppers)

recipeInstructions.text: Boil each separately, add to broth after draining. Heat to boiling. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
